name: Shootout at jungle
description:
Controls:

WSAD- movement

Spacebar- Jump

H- remove/add scope

F- Toggle Flashlight

R- Reload Weapon

Description:

A personal first person shooter project I'm currently working on in unreal 5.1.  

Features:

v1.0

  • Programmed gameplay mechanics and animation mechanics
  • Added task based level mission- need to destroy all barrels to win
  • Programmed Ui elements, added main menu, pause menu
  • Created explosive barrel with sound effects and vfx effects
  • Created open world level
